catalog_script_client.name: Auto Populate Email, comapny, location

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_281f0e6b931f6a1005b6367efaba10ab
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Desktop or Laptop">5fc33510939ba25005b6367efaba1027</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6f7cf5d8939ba25005b6367efaba1018</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Populate Email, comapny, location</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
  if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
    return;
  }

  // Variable names on the form
  var EMAIL_VAR   = 'email_address';
  var COMPANY_VAR = 'company_name';
  var LOC_VAR     = 'comp_location';

  // Use getReference to fetch full user record from sys_user
  g_form.getReference('user_id', function(user) {
    if (!user) {
      // Clear fields if no user
      g_form.clearValue(EMAIL_VAR);
      g_form.clearValue(COMPANY_VAR);
      g_form.clearValue(LOC_VAR);
      return;
    }

    // Debug log
    console.log('User object:', user);

    // Populate email
    if (user.email) {
      g_form.setValue(EMAIL_VAR, user.email);
      console.log('Email set to:', user.email);
    }

    // Populate company (if company is a reference field on sys_user)
    if (user.company && user.company.display_value) {
      g_form.setValue(COMPANY_VAR, user.company.display_value);
      console.log('Company set to:', user.company.display_value);
    }

    // Populate location
    if (user.location && user.location.display_value) {
      g_form.setValue(LOC_VAR, user.location.display_value);
      console.log('Location set to:', user.location.display_value);
    }
  });
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-17 17:39:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>281f0e6b931f6a1005b6367efaba10ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Populate Email, comapny, location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_281f0e6b931f6a1005b6367efaba10ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-17 17:40:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
